column5: Hi, What rules did Ontario come up with for Lake Erie in 2004.Is the commerial fishing going to be closed in the spring. May I be fishing somewhere Tomorrow
Hi, Are you guys keeping the rules a secret. May I be fishing somewhere Tomorrow

I know they will be closed in the Spring, but what dates exactly, I'm not sure. I think it coincides with the Michigan dates, but don't quote me on that. If you post it on the General Discussion board you will probably get it answered faster. Juls
It opens May 8th on Ontario side. Here's the link..http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/MNR/pubs/fi...p_A_fr2004.pdf
